verses.verse: Yahweh,<WH3068> my heart<WH3820> isn't<WH1361> haughty, nor my eyes<WH5869> lofty;<WH7311> nor do I concern<WH1980> myself with great matters,<WH1419> or things too wonderful for me.<WH6381>
Surely I have stilled<WH7737> and quieted<WH1826> my soul,<WH5315> like a weaned<WH1580> child with his mother,<WH517> like a weaned child<WH1580> is my soul within me.<WH5315>
Israel,<WH3478> hope<WH3176> in Yahweh,<WH3068> from this time forth and<WH5704> forevermore.<WH5769>
